title: Bidenâ€™s COP27 Climate Message Might Not Be the One the World Wants
description: The president is expected to hail the new U.S. climate law on Friday at the COP27 summit in Egypt. Other countries want to talk money.
dc:creator: Lisa Friedman
category: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
media:description: President Biden speaking at the White House on Wednesday. He is scheduled to appear at the United Nations climate talks, known as COP27, in Egypt on Friday.
